CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT walks in the room holding CHI's hand followed by INV . MOT sits in the chair near the door CHI looks around the room and bends down and tries to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box . INV leaves the room
<aft> MOT puts her bag on the floor
CHI glances up at INV as she leaves
CHI continues to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT puts her pocketbook on the floor
camera shifts to CHI so MOT is not visible
CHI looks at the toy car
CHI starts to reach for the toy car
MOT is out of camera view
CHI reaches for a toy on the floor
CHI picks up the toy football
CHI glances up at the chair next to her
CHI begins to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box with one hand as she holds the toy football in the other
MOT points to the book on the floor
CHI looks around briefly and then up at the wall
CHI still has the football in one hand and her other hand is on the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns so that she is looking at the adjacent wall
CHI looks at the floor in front of her
CHI turns the opposite way and looks behind her at the book
CHI looks intently at the book
CHI is still holding the football and starts to open the book
CHI puts football down on floor and turns more toward book to open it
CHI tries to open the cover of the book again but fails
CHI turns herself more to the book and sprawls out on the floor a little
CHI grabs the book and turns it back a page
CHI closes the book and picks up the football
MOT leans forward and extends her hands
<bef> CHI picks at the end of the football . CHI hands the football to MOT
MOT leans forward and extends her hands to CHI as she looks at her
CHI throws the ball at MOT
the football bounces off of MOT's hand
MOT watches CHI with her hands extended
CHI retrieves the ball and places it in MOT's hands
MOT holds the ball to her chest briefly
most of MOT goes back out of camera view
CHI turns and starts looking at the toys on the floor
CHI picks up the toy duck
<aft> MOT moves her pocketbook under her chair
CHI holds the duck in front of her and looks at it
MOT bends her arm and rests her head on her hand as she watches CHI
CHI squeezes the duck once more briefly and then starts to get up
CHI turns to face the jack+in+the+box
CHI puts her hand on the jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up the box by the handle and places it upright on the floor
CHI tries unsuccessfully to turn the handle
CHI turns to MOT and extends her arms upwards
<bef> MOT holds out the football to CHI and throws it
CHI tries to catch the ball but misses it
CHI picks up the toy car
CHI looks at the toy car closely
CHI looks at the car intently
CHI puts the car on the floor
CHI rolls the car on the floor
CHI looks at the car closely
CHI continues to look at the car
CHI puts the car down on the floor
MOT is still out of camera view
<aft> CHI picks up the toy duck and squeezes it
CHI puts the duck on the floor and holds the football with both hands
CHI looks down at the football
<aft> CHI slaps the top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI turns to face MOT and holds the football high over her head
CHI throws the football on MOT's foot
the football bounces off of MOT's foot
CHI stands up and walks to the ball
CHI picks up the ball and walks across the room
CHI takes a few more steps forward
CHI looks up at the two-way mirror on the opposite wall
CHI follows the camera with her eyes
CHI stares up at the camera
CHI lowers her eyes but still looks at the camera
CHI lifts one side of her dress up and puts it in her mouth
MOT points to a chair behind CHI
CHI turns around and looks at the chair
CHI takes an uncertain step backwards and then runs over to the chair
CHI looks down at the cushion of the chair
<bef> CHI turns and points to the trash barrel in the room
CHI takes a few steps towards the trash . <aft> CHI holds the football with both hands
CHI turns to face the camera as she looks down at the football
CHI walks over to the jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI looks down at the trash and points to it still holding the football in her other hand
CHI continues to point and look down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at the object briefly and slowly stops pointing . CHI then looks down at the football
CHI holds the football with both hands
<bef> CHI looks up towards the camera and then lowers her eyes . CHI looks up at MOT
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks down at the football
CHI pushes on the football with both hands
CHI looks up at MOT and then to the door
CHI turns toward door as it opens

CHAT.comment: INV explains Small Scale Activity and then leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place. INV reenters room at 09:50:57

u.a: INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI one toy and clears away the toys from Forbidden Object Task
MOT leans close to CHI as she speaks
INV takes the object out of the drawer and puts it on the table
INV sets the object in motion
MOT reaches out to restrain CHI
CHI pulls her hand back as she stares at the object
MOT leans forward as she smiles and looks at CHI
CHI touches MOT's chin affectionately with her hand
MOT leans forward as she smiles and looks at CHI
CHI looks at Forbidden Object <aft> CHI turns and reaches for MOT
MOT smiles and looks down at CHI
CHI leans close to MOT then straightens out and looks at INV
MOT leans toward CHI and looks at her
MOT leans down and looks at CHI
CHI is looking at Object and chewing on finger
MOT leans down and looks at CHI
CHI reaches up for MOT and then notices the beads on the table
CHI grabs the beads on the table
CHI looks down at the necklace
CHI plays with the beads on the table
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . MOT takes CHI down from the chair
CHI watches INV leave as she reaches for INV

CHI looks up at the desk

MOT is tossing ball back and forth in her hands

<$=2> CHI continues to hold ball in lap

MOT turns to desk to get next box

MOT takes the towel out of the box
MOT hold towel up to CHI

CHI tosses towel on floor beside her

CHI looks at MOT then points to desk

CHI points again to PCI box on desk

MOT takes another PCI box from desk

MOT takes another piece of paper from box and puts it on the floor
